title: Monumental Sports Network and Willow by Cricbuzz Partner to Air Washington Freedom’s Major League Cricket Matches
body:
Washington Freedom’s Major League Cricket Matches to be Broadcast Live on Monumental Sports Network Starting July 6

Washington, D.C. – June 26, 2024 – Willow by Cricbuzz, offering more live, streaming and on-demand cricket than any other sports service, and Monumental Sports Network (MNMT) today announced a groundbreaking partnership to broadcast Washington Freedom matches this upcoming Major League Cricket (MLC) season. The first match available to fans on Monumental Sports Network will be the Freedom’s season opener vs. MI New York on July 6, 2024, at 3:00 PM ET. The Freedom are the first professional cricket team to represent Washington, D.C. and began play in 2023.

The network’s slate will feature seven matches from July 6 to July 22. Monumental Sports Network is the exclusive local television media rights holder for the NHL’s Washington Capitals, the NBA’s Washington Wizards, and the WNBA’s Washington Mystics. It also boasts a comprehensive schedule of original programming and live men’s and women’s college basketball, college football, college volleyball, high school basketball, and esports, as well as Washington Spirit (NWSL), Old Glory DC (Major League Rugby), Hershey Bears (AHL), and Annapolis Blues (NPSL) games.

“Washington Freedom matches are an electric addition to our summer programming lineup and further our commitment to all sports fans throughout the DMV,” said Caitlin Mangum, Vice President, Content & Programming at Monumental Sports Network. “Cricket is undergoing a surge of popularity in the U.S. and we’re excited for a new audience to get exposure to the plethora of live, local sports programming on our air.”

“The unexpected success of the US national cricket team in the T20 World Cup has vividly shown us the untapped potential of cricket in America,” said Todd Myers, COO of Willow by Cricbuzz. “We are now at a pivotal turning point where we can leverage the country’s excitement and passion for the sport to build a broader, more engaged fan base nationwide. Our partnership with Monumental Sports Network is key in this transformative era, bringing premier cricket directly to American viewers and giving them a hometown team, the Washington Freedom, to cheer for.”

Fans within the network’s footprint can watch Washington Freedom matches live on Monumental Sports Network, which is available on both linear TV and streaming platforms. Viewers from Delaware to Richmond, VA can access these matches through their Pay TV subscription, directly on monumentalsportsnetwork.com, or by using the Monumental Sports Network streaming app, compatible with iOS, Android, Apple TV, Roku, and Amazon Fire TV devices. For those without a Pay TV subscription, Monumental Sports Network offers direct-to-consumer subscription memberships, which can be purchased monthly or annually either on their website or via the Monumental Sports Network app.

Willow by Cricbuzz will also distribute all MLC matches this season on TV and its dedicated streaming app. To learn more, please visit www.willow.tv.

2024 Washington Freedom Matches on Monumental Sports Network:

Saturday, July 6 vs. MI New York at 3:00 PM ET

Monday, July 8 vs. Texas Super Kings at 3:00 PM ET

Thursday, July 11 at Seattle Orcas at 8:30 PM ET

Sunday, July 14 vs. LA Knight Riders at 3:30 PM ET

Tuesday, July 16 at MI New York at 8:30 PM ET

Friday, July 19 vs. Texas Super Kings at 8:30 PM ET

Monday, July 22 vs. San Francisco Unicorns at 8:30 PM ET

Willow by Cricbuzz is the premier destination for cricket in the United States and Canada, boasting the most comprehensive live, streaming, and on-demand cricket coverage available. Guided by its mission to make cricket globally accessible, Willow by Cricbuzz combines cricket’s rich heritage with innovative broadcasting to offer an unmatched viewing experience.

Dedicated to excellence and innovation, Willow by Cricbuzz provides cricket enthusiasts with HD-quality live streaming, interactive scorecards, and extensive coverage from nearly every major cricket board and tournament worldwide.

Willow by Cricbuzz’s TV network is also available through top providers such as DISH, Sling, Fios, Spectrum, Xfinity, and Optimum, and also offers a dedicated streaming app available on all major CTV devices, including Apple TV, Roku, Samsung Smart TVs, Amazon Fire TV, Xbox One, Android TV, Chromecast, Google TV, and more, ensuring fans never miss a moment of the action.

title: The Hundred: Jason Roy replaces Brydon Carse at Northern Superchargers
body:
Roy replaces Carse at Superchargers

Published

26 June 2024

Former England opener Jason Roy has signed for Hundred side Northern Superchargers as a replacement for banned seamer Brydon Carse.

Roy, 33, was unselected in the draft in March after spending three seasons with Oval Invincibles.

He could miss the beginning of this year's campaign, which begins on 23 July, due to his commitments with LA Knight Riders in Major League Cricket in the USA.

Carse, 28, is serving a three-month ban for historical breaches of betting rules and will miss the entire Hundred competition.

Superchargers will be led for the first time be former England all-rounder Andrew Flintoff, who has been appointed head coach following the departure of James Foster.

title: Jason Roy replaces Brydon Carse at Northern Superchargers in the Hundred as Flintoff Bolsters Squad
body:
Jason Roy joins Northern Superchargers as a replacement player for the Hundred team, replacing Brydon Carse who was ruled out due to suspension, with Roy being unsold at the initial draft.

By the Numbers

Roy entered the draft with a £100,000 reserve price.

Roy averaged 17.11 in the title-winning 2023 season for the Oval Invincibles.

Yes, But

Jason Roy may miss the Superchargers' opening match in the Hundred due to his commitments in Major League Cricket with the Los Angeles Knight Riders.

State of Play

Andrew Flintoff will be coaching the Superchargers for the men's Hundred, taking over from James Foster.

Roy withdrew from the IPL to prioritize family time and has been dealing with a calf injury that caused him to miss Surrey's recent T20 Blast games.

What's Next

Mark Wood is yet to sign a replacement deal for a Hundred team, likely waiting for clarity on his availability during England's Test matches.

Bottom Line

Jason Roy's addition to the Northern Superchargers brings hope for a resurgence in his form, with Andrew Flintoff's mentorship potentially aiding his performance in the Hundred.

title: Monumental Sports Network to Air 7 Major League Cricket Matches This Summer; Will Other RSNs Add Cricket?
body:
Apparently, the United States national cricket team’s victory against Pakistan in the 2024 T20 World Cup earlier this month has created higher enthusiasm for the sport domestically. That’s the gamble Monumental Sports Network is taking, at any rate. The regional sports network (RSN) which serves fans in Washington, D.C., the DMV and parts of Pennsylvania has announced a new partnership with Willow by Cricbuzz to distribute a package of Major League Cricket matches featuring the Washington Freedom, beginning with a match on Saturday, July 6.

Monumental Sports is available on DIRECTV STREAM, Hulu Live TV, and YouTube TV.

Key Details:

Monumental Sports Network’s coverage of Washington Freedom cricket will continue through July.

Viewers can watch Monumental as part of a pay-TV subscription, or in-market with the Monumental Sports Network App.

Major League Cricket matches are normally broadcast on Willow TV in the United States.

Monumental is partnering with Willow to offer seven Washington Freedom cricket matches, beginning on July 6 and continuing through July 22. The matches will join WNBA basketball contests from the Washington Mystics, though they won’t be available on Monumental long enough to air alongside NBA games from the Washington Wizards or NHL matchups featuring the Washington Capitals on the channel.

Check out Monumental’s schedule of Washington Freedom matches:

Date Time (ET) Opponent Saturday, July 6 3 p.m. MI New York Monday, July 8 3 p.m. Texas Super Kings Thursday, July 11 8:30 p.m. Seattle Orcas Sunday, July 14 3:30 p.m. LA Knight Riders Tuesday, July 16 8:30 p.m. MI New York Friday, July 19 8:30 p.m. Texas Super Kings Monday, July 22 8:30 p.m. San Francisco Unicorns

The presentations are being made in partnership with Willow, which carries all MLC matches on the Willow TV channel and Willow on-demand streaming platform. Chief operating officer of Willow Todd Myers specifically cited the U.S. national team’s victory at the T20 World Cup as an inciting factor for the partnership with Monumental.

“The unexpected success of the US national cricket team in the T20 World Cup has vividly shown us the untapped potential of cricket in America,” Myers said. “We are now at a pivotal turning point where we can leverage the country’s excitement and passion for the sport to build a broader, more engaged fan base nationwide. Our partnership with Monumental Sports Network is key in this transformative era, bringing premier cricket directly to American viewers and giving them a hometown team, the Washington Freedom, to cheer for.”

“Washington Freedom matches are an electric addition to our summer programming lineup and further our commitment to all sports fans throughout the DMV,” added Caitlin Mangum, VP, Content & Programming at Monumental Sports Network. “Cricket is undergoing a surge of popularity in the U.S. and we’re excited for a new audience to get exposure to the plethora of live, local sports programming on our air.”

Will Other RSNs Try to Add Live Cricket Rights?

The addition of live cricket matches based off what’s likely a temporary ratings boost for the sport thanks to a single World Cup victory from Team USA may seem like a bit of an overreaction to some. But with the cost of marquee sports rights climbing inexorably, providers are looking for any way to bring new content to their airwaves without paying extreme amounts to get it.

That could lead more RSNs to add small cricket packages of their own in the near future. Major League Cricket only has six teams at the moment, but some are stationed in cities like Los Angeles and New York where viewers have access to SportsNet-branded RSNs. I don’t think any cricket teams playing in areas where a Bally Sports channel is the dominant RSN will see a new deal with Willow to distribute games in the near future; Diamond Sports Group, which owns the Bally Sports channels, has enough problems with the partner leagues it currently has at the moment.

title: San Francisco Unicorns release 2024 uniforms and merchandise with Belgravia Apparel
body:
For the second consecutive season, The Bay Area’s Major League Cricket team will wear uniforms produced by elite Australian custom teamwear apparel brand Belgravia

The Belgravia San Francisco Unicorns online team store for uniforms and apparel will be available from Monday June 24

The sophomore season of Major League Cricket (MLC) will begin on July 5, with the first of the Unicorns’ seven regular-season matches taking place on July 7. Tickets for all matches are available now at tickets.majorleaguecricket.com

SAN FRANCISCO, Ca. (Jun 22, 2024) — The San Francisco Unicorns will wear uniforms produced by Australian custom teamwear brand Belgravia Apparel in the sophomore season of Major League Cricket, which begins on July 5.

The Australian custom teamwear apparel brand – who provided the San Francisco Unicorns’ first-ever uniforms for the inaugural 2023 MLC season – will officially release the 2024 uniforms and make them available for purchase on Monday June 24. The official store will also feature a range of merchandise that includes jerseys, t-shirts, polo shirts, shorts and caps.

“After a hugely successful partnership with the San Francisco Unicorns last season, we’re absolutely delighted to team up with the Bay Area’s team once again,” said Joe Siciliano, Belgravia’s General Manager of National Elite Sports. “As an established brand that creates uniforms and apparel for professional sports teams in Australia and New Zealand, we’re excited to continue expanding the footprint of our world-class operations in the United States.”

Belgravia Apparel produces uniforms for professional and elite teams in cricket, soccer, rugby, Australian rules football, basketball, hockey, and many more.

“With a rich heritage and history in the sport, Belgravia Apparel were an ideal partner in our inaugural season, so naturally we’re thrilled to wear their iconic designs in 2024,” said San Francisco Unicorns General Manager David White. “Belgravia’s entrepreneurial spirit and mission to grow the sport of cricket aligns with our objectives, and we’re really pleased to give fans in the Bay Area the chance to wear our colors and support our team.”

The 2024 Major League Cricket season will commence on July 5, with San Francisco Unicorn’s first match coming on July 7, when they take on the LA Knight Riders at Grand Prairie Stadium, in Grand Prairie, TX.

The Unicorns’ 2024 roster features Australia captain Pat Cummins, explosive batters Finn Allen and Matthew Short, express bowler Haris Rauf, and future superstar Jake Fraser-McGurk. For the second successive season, the Unicorns will be coached by two-time Indian Premier League (IPL) Player of the Season Shane Watson.

title: Lexus Goes to Bat for Cognizant Major League Cricket League
body:
By Allison Watkinson

TLL Reporter

Cognizant Major League Cricket (MLC) has secured a licensing sponsorship partnership with the Lexus automotive brand for the league’s upcoming second season.

MLC is the first professional Twenty20 cricket championship to operate in the US. Exclusively sanctioned by USA Cricket, MLC showcases players from around the globe.

MLC’s first cricket season took place in 2023 and featured matches with the Los Angeles Knight Riders, MI New York, San Francisco Unicorns, Seattle Orcas, Texas Super Kings and the Washington Freedom.

“We are excited to welcome Lexus as the automotive partner of Major League Cricket,” said Major League Cricket CEO, Vijay Srinivasan. “Their reputation for unparalleled luxury and commitment to their customers aligns perfectly with our vision for the league. Together, we look forward to delivering an exceptional experience to cricket fans across the nation.”

Under the new agreement, the Lexus brand will be integrated into both on-field and broadcasted content throughout the MLC season. The brand will also be prominently featured across MLC’s digital platforms and fan communications.

“Partnering with Major League Cricket offers Lexus the opportunity to reach a new diverse fanbase with a brand that shares an unwavering commitment to performance, customer experience, and their fans,” said Lexus advertising head, David Telfer. “We’re committed to growing with MLC during its second season to elevate the presence of the U.S. team and engage with new fans.”

MLC kicks off its second season on July 5, 2024. Tickets for all matches, including the four playoffs, are available online through the Official Cognizant Major League Cricket website.

The MLC season will extend beyond the pitch with a range of entertainment, events and giveaways that will take place throughout the tournament. The events and entertainment will include fireworks shows, player meet-and-greets, autograph signings, merchandise giveaways and more.

Initially launched in 1989, Lexus is a luxury automotive brand that distributes its vehicles in more than 90 countries acrosss the globe. In the US, Lexus offers a full range of luxury vehicles that are sold through a nationwide network of 244 automotive dealerships.

title: Cheer for the Seattle Orcas by grabbing your tickets for MLC Season 2
body:
The Seattle Orcas will kick off their 2024 Cognizant Major League Cricket season against MI New York on Friday, July 5th in what will be a rematch of last year’s final. The highly anticipated match is set to take place at Church Street Park in Morrisville, North Carolina.

“Last year’s final was an unforgettable experience,” said All-rounder Harmeet Singh, who played in the 2023 final. “We’re excited to start against New York this time around and look forward to getting our season started on the right foot.”

This year’s season opener promises an electric atmosphere, especially with players returning from a successful World Cup. Seattle Orcas’ Harmeet Singh and Aaron Jones were part of the USA’s record-breaking run to the Super-8 stage and have experienced the fans' energy firsthand.

“It’s a great opportunity for fans to show their appreciation for the players who made such an impact this summer, for both the USA and all the sides at the World Cup,” said a coach or somebody who is not Harmeet or Aaron from the Seattle Orcas preseason camp(LINK). “Of course we’re looking to start the season with a positive result too, and the entire squad is focused on preparations for this season’s opener.

After North Carolina, the action shifts to Grand Prairie in Dallas - the site of USA’s famous win against Pakistan from this summer.

“We’ll be chomping at the bit to play in Dallas,” said Aaron Jones. “Obviously we have great memories there from this Summer with the USA and we’re looking forward to playing in front of another packed house.”

Tickets for all the matches for Season 2 are now on sale, starting at $30 for both venues. Apart from individual match tickets, an All Regular Season Matches pass is also available for both Grand Prairie and Morrisville, starting at $288 and $216 respectively.
